name: Amanita
description:
A cute mysterious short game. 

Discover a beautiful world, and see it changing.

Move with arrows, and grab with space.

Made by with Blukulele, Julialalart, Fate and BastinusRex for the ludum dare 46 !

The theme was "Keep it alive" !

We hope you will enjoy the game !

ldj link : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/amanita
